text: Are there any recommended eslint configurations that would help make sure code never breaks when HubSpot runs its concatenation process? I had a problem in production today that was really hard to track down. I ended up modifying so many things that I can't be 100% sure what happened.

but threw this warning/error:
```DevTools failed to load SourceMap: Could not parse content for <https://app.HubSpot.com/content/editor/prefetcher.js.map>: Unexpected token ! in JSON at position 0```
Which as far as I can tell happens on the server when a page is loaded
